item.title: Breaking down Grok 3: The AI model that could redefine the industry
item.description: Grok-3 still hasn't fully shipped yet. But it will surely set the tone for how other AI labs release future models.

item.title: Xbox’s AI initiative with Muse is an attempt to read the tea leaves, not the room
item.description: Earlier today, the heads of Microsoft’s Xbox division revealed Muse, a generative AI model that intends to create both visuals and gameplay for games....

item.title: A Stytch in time: Connected Apps untangles authorization tie-ups for AI agents
item.description: Stytch Connected Apps enables AI agents and third-party apps to authenticate, access data and take action on behalf of users.

item.title: Crunchbase’s AI can predict startup success with 95% accuracy—will it change investing?
item.description: Crunchbase pivots to AI-powered predictions engine with 95% accuracy for startup funding rounds, abandoning historical data in favor of predictive int...

item.title: Muse is Xbox’s generative AI model for gameplay ideation
item.description: Microsoft researchers have created the first generative AI model, Muse, for game ideation.
